Content:
In 2016, Matthieu Aikins mailed his passport to a friend, wiped his phone and assumed the identity of an Afghan refugee named Habib.

He tells the story of a migrant family's journey on smugglers' road in his book, The Naked Don't Fear the Water.
https://t.co/l37rjk7w0W
